title: Torch - Whitelight for Wear
summary: Lets turn your Android Wear into a flashlight, to explore those dark places ;)
description: The brightest torch for Android wear!!That's not all folks, you can also turn it into a blinking flashlight/torch just by tapping on the flashing screen of your Android Wear. This app is compatible with all Android Wear devices.Please make sure that:-Your Android smartphone is compatible with Android Wear.-You pair your Android smartphone with the Android Wearable device with help of the Android Wear App.To start the app, Just say: "OK Google... Start White Light or Launch White Light or Open White Light" or Go to "Start..." and select White Light.Tags : torch, light, blink, wear, flashlight
descriptionHTML:
The brightest torch for Android wear!!
That's not all folks, you can also turn it into a blinking flashlight/torch just by tapping on the flashing screen of your Android Wear.

This app is compatible with all Android Wear devices.

Please make sure that:
-Your Android smartphone is compatible with Android Wear.
-You pair your Android smartphone with the Android Wearable device with help of the Android Wear App.

To start the app, Just say: "OK Google... Start White Light or Launch White Light or Open White Light" or Go to "Start..." and select White Light.

Tags : torch, light, blink, wear, flashlight
comments: Simple and useful Amazing user interface. Better than other light apps anyday. Works like a charm on my moto360.
